name: Fantasy Mosaics 11: Fleeing from Dinosaurs
description:
Following the tradition of multi-color gameplay, this new installment brings you a great gallery of custom built mosaic puzzles!

Fleeing from the land of dinosaurs, the penguin family came to an unknown place in the ancient forest.
Help them make new discoveries and complete a variety of complex logic puzzles!


- Multi-color mosaic puzzles also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Make new discoveries

- Stunning background art

- Puzzles based on logic
